name: Patty
text: Food was very good. Service was great. Place was clean. Never disappoints.

name: Cary Hirst

name: Jim McSherry
text: Food is good. Especially burgers! Decent soup too! But slow, slow, slow service! Did I mention service was slow...

name: Jim Shaw
text: Standard grilled sandwich fare here. This one may not be typical but the place looked very tired (cracked fake leather seats, tables werebt clean). Staff were friendly and helpful. Would not visit again

name: Malik Oliver
text: Unfortunately I could not neat my sandwich after I left. I asked for no tomatoes and there were tomatoes. Additionally, The steak bowl was very poorly done. The meat was cold and four slices of cheese were just thrown on top. I had three items and wasn't asked if I needed a bag to carry it.

name: Michael Currie
text: My sandwich was fine, not hot, but fine. Here's why... First time using the online ordering and the first time at this particular franchise.  After registering, I ordered 1 sandwich to be ready in the future (not right away). I paid online …More

name: Olivia Hillhouse
text: To start off, the line (Even though only two people were in front of us) was horrible it took over 15 minuets (at least) to just order our food. After ordering we sat down at a very dirty  table booth with seats covered with old food and …More

name: James Flesch
text: Generally a fan of D'Angelo's, but this location in Bedford Ma is consistently, extremely, slow. last 4 times I was there, it took between 25 - 35 minutes to get a sub. Four people working and they still can't seem to get food out in a …More

name: Romka Ryabinkin
text: Had pastrami awiss... so good.  Not sure why it is not as popular as one would think it should be

name: Rachid Bitar
text: Yesterday the staff was amazing and food good

name: Maurice King
text: Been going to this store for a few years now, awesome and friendly staff.

name: Wil Nichols
text: Good food, good price, and this location had the friendliest staff I've talked to in a fast food place in years.

name: James Morgan
text: Hey it's a fast easy reliable place for lunch.

name: Benjamin Guth
text: Good service for a fast sandwich shop.

name: Matthew Stieglitz
text: Great lobster roll but not cheap

name: Daysprung
text: Good sandwich shop, sometimes understaffed. Recommend the steak subs and the thanksgiving toasted!

name: Absol Hunter
text: Tastes so good i like the steak/cheese.

name: Starlet Lebrun
text: First lobster roll. Not bad, but not spectacular either.

name: Steven Walsh
text: Had the toasted Thanksgiving sub. Absolutely excellent!!!

name: Laurie LeMay
text: I received first class service, when the manager of that site personally delivered my sub after a problem with my order - with a smile.  Thanks Bedford D'Angelos! …More

text: Clean & Great service

name: Cameron Lewis
text: Great sandwich + service!

name: Diana kaz
text: Awesomely. Great sandwiches

name: Joseph Martin

text: Too chainish for me. I like my Ma & Pa places that don't use processed meats with fillers.

name: Bill Blackwood
text: Disappointed.  Overcooked #9 with a long wait.

text: Very good food

name: Kenneth Kelly
text: Sandwich was half full but when I showed them they put the rest of the filling in.

text: Decent food!!

name: Dave North
text: from the first time I visited a D'angelos back in 2001, the number 9 has been a staple every time I'm in Mass.  What a sandwich!
